description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in Remote Desktop Client (CVE-2024-43599):

1. Download the appropriate KB updates based on your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the update applicable to your system's architecture and version.
3. Restart your system to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates resolve a use-after-free vulnerability that allows remote code execution.
- For manual installations, you can download the update packages from the following links:
  - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
  - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system runs one of the affected Windows builds mentioned above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
